Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cgqz902.jpg'}
{2: 'System Voice', 3: 'That is the plan for the operation.'}
{2: 'System Voice', 3: 'You must be reminded again that this operation is very important and comes with certain risks.'}
{2: 'System Voice', 3: 'There is a large number of Corrupted in the battle area. Teams must work closely together to achieve the goal of liberating the area.'}
{2: 'System Voice', 3: "Please act with your assigned team and strictly follow the mission orders. In other cases, the commandant's decisions are the final commands."}
{2: 'System Voice', 3: 'Finally, I wish you all to return in triumph.'}
{2: 'System Voice', 3: 'â€” Please accept the highest regards from the Command Center.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory20.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Shame that we're in different teams...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Koya', 3: "But aren't you on the same team as Lucia? I thought you wanted to have a practice match with her?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "That's right... But Lucia doesn't like to talk. I'll look stupid if I'm the only one who enjoys the game and she doesn't even care a bit of it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Koya', 3: "Hahaha, didn't think you would worry about stuff like this.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Koya', 3: 'But she does look a little too distant indeed.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Whoa! Quietly or she'll hear us!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Koya', 3: "I didn't mean to say anything bad... I just feel that she is a little too determined, as if there is some kind of obsession supporting her to fight.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Is that so... Oh right, let's return to base together after finishing our mission!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'System', 3: 'Attention, the operation will begin in three minutes. Please proceed to the platform with the corresponding number to board the transport craft and prepare for battle.'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'We must get rid of those pests this time!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Koya', 3: "Well, let's part our ways here... And take care of yourself, Kamui. See you after the operation.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Construct Kamui.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "I'll sacrifice everything to liberate the Earth.", 4: '1'}
